posts.title: Strawberry Cheesecake Kit Kat
posts.content: Experience sugary ecstasy by sinking your teeth into a strawberry cheesecake Kit Kat. Unlike the traditional Kit Kat bar, this Japanese variation comes coated in creamy white chocolate instead of the traditional dark chocolate and features a delightful creamy taste and texture.

posts.title: Craft Beer Home Tap Machine
posts.content: Life’s too short to drink skunk beer. Enjoy a quality brew without having to venture outside by outfitting your bar with this craft beer home tap machine.This 67 ounce capacity tap is designed to keep your favorite brew fresh, chilled, and pressurized for up to 2 weeks.

posts.title: Biscotti Gourmet Cookie Gift Box
posts.content: What better way to surprise your favorite sweet-toothed friend than with this Biscotti gourmet cookie gift box? Each elegant box comes packed with a series of eighteen tastefully decorated crunchy Biscotti’s dipped in chocolate and garnished with sweet confections.

posts.title: Rick And Morty Total Rickall Card Game
posts.content: Experience your favorite Adult Swim show like never before by gathering around and playing the Rick And Morty Total Rickall card game. You must figure out which of these new, zany characters are real and which ones are parasites that need to be exterminated.

posts.title: Traxxas R/C Land Rover Defender
posts.content: Enjoy the thrill of off-roading remotely by getting behind the controls of the Traxxas R/C Land Rover Defender. It comes with a powerful 21T Titan 550 motor, a heavy duty steel frame, and aluminum shocks that make it ideal for rugged terrain.

posts.title: Smartphone Instant Film Printer
posts.content: Share your narcissistic selfies on a whole new level with the smartphone instant film printer. This portable printer lets you instantly print the pictures you take with your smartphone, so all your friends can have their very own <del>dick pic</del> duck-face picture of you.

posts.title: Harry Potter Sleeved Blanket
posts.content: Snuggle up and feel like a true wizard with these Harry Potter sleeved blankets. Even if you are only a muggle, these sleeved blankets will give you the look and feel of a Hogwarts apprentice, especially when combined with the magic wand TV remote control.

posts.title: Brainwave Cat Ears
posts.content: Amuse yourself and others around you by passing the time playing with these brainwave cat ears. Each pair of furry cat ears employs state of the art brainwave technology – so they’ll move in real time based on your emotions.

posts.title: Guitar Pick Maker
posts.content: Salvage your old credit cards, IDs, and other hard plastic cards by turning them into guitar picks. This hole puncher can convert almost anything into a standard 351 shape guitar pick, making it a great gift for musicians who like to personalize their equipment.

posts.title: Pocket Shot Arrow Slingshot
posts.content: This pocket shot arrow slingshot allows you to hone your archery skills without having to lug around a cumbersome bow. It comes in 4 separate pieces that are easily assembled together so that you can fire  small arrows at speeds of up to 140 feet per second.

posts.title: Concealed Compartment Shelf
posts.content: Protect your valuables by hiding them in plain sight inside of this concealed compartment shelf. It features an ample 23.5 x 3 x 7.5 inch compartment that easily locks and unlocks using the included RFID key and token – no combinations necessary.

posts.title: The Bucket List Journal For Couples
posts.content: Accomplish the goals you and your better half always talked about by writing them down in The Bucket List Journal For Couples. It’s divided into 7 categories that are designed to help you and your significant other put your goals into action.
